author: makemake
content: im not sure if this is the right channel to ask, but would a goerli regenesis be feasible considering theres a big drought of goeth? People have been paying up to $0.5 per goeth so id say its gotten pretty bad

author: alexssd7fp
content: Why you need large amounts of GoETH? There is no reason for that except if you want to stake

author: makemake
content: i dont personally need it since i have a enough myself, but i see people in various dev communities complaining about not being able to get enough goeth

author: alexssd7fp
content:
Ok,
“Why *they* need large amounts of GoETH? There is no reason for that except if you want to stake”

author: makemake
content: they dont need *large* amounts of goeth. from what i see, they need relatively small amounts for dev purposes. the only real way to get enough goeth is to use the pow faucet, but its pretty tedious due to the relatively small amount of rewards per share (which im assuming is to prevent it from running dry)
